attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: It literally took three days to download, and then completely shut down all my news apps, even the on google gives to you. Every time I clicked a news app or article, this thing would pop up saying I can’t see this because it’s ‘fake news’. And when I went to delete the app, it threaten me saying that it would force me to listen to a 9+ hour clip of all Trumps speeches.

attributes.title: CREEPY MESSAGES
attributes.review: ok i was skeptical that this was the ACTUAL president of the united states app cause like why tf would a president own an app thas just dumb but it said official so i was like why not download it and see if it’s a troll or not. It’s not a troll he made me sign up first which already 🤢🤢, but i did it then i just started receiving all these racist and honestly creepy pedophilac like notifications and got super super creeped out. so i deleted it and he’s not getting a vote from me

attributes.title: HORRIBLE ZERO STARS
attributes.review: this horrible app took like five hours to download on my phone then me being the nice person i am let it download while giving my phone to my son. turns out my son went on the app when it finished downloading and it hypnotized him into walking into a power nuclear plant that gave him corona virus. and walk to the white house and sneeze on donald trump(loved the sneezing on donald part) but now my son is sick so10/10 would not recommend

attributes.title: This ain’t it Chief 💅🏼✨
attributes.review:
Literally the worst app ever. After downloading this app, I got a virus on my phone and now everything I click turns orange and a few days later I realized that it’s because this app is using the apps on my home screen to make it look like Trump, I don’t need that right now because I actually want to be able to peacefully sleep rather than have nightmares. 
So please save yourself and beware. 
Peace out luv 🧚🏼‍♀️💖😎🔥⚡️😌

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Took forever to download. After downloading my iPhone exploded killing my pet rhinoceros named sprinkles. My pet bunny Little Saturn survived. As for me I suffered a broken leg, broken ribs and both my hands were completely blown off leaving me to dictate this review to my supermodel girlfriend who is in tears. My career as a Tennis player is over, no more Wimbledon for me. I’ll survive and now have pirate hooks as hands. I’ll be back on my feet soon.  Please don’t download this app!

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL AND A SCAM
attributes.review: I cant BELIEVE THIS 😡 i downloaded this app and believed that it would help me being pro Trump. 😬 Little did I know this was all a scam!!!! 😱 As I opened the app, a picture of Donald Trump’s little sausage appeared on my screen while I was in PUBLIC!!! 🤢🤢🤢 And to make it worse, Children were around to see!!!!! 🤮😵 I was then arrested for public indecency!!!!!! 😑😑🤯 So as I type this review from my jail cell, I warn everyone to AVOID this app at all costs!!!!! 🤡 And vote out Trump November 3rd 👏👏✅

attributes.title: Terrible Glitches
attributes.review: Forced closed at worse times. Extremely unreliable, always showing me the wrong information. Had a orange type of tint to it, very hard on the eyes. Would constantly say racist and homophobic things. So very absurd of the app to do so. The layout is just terrible, seems like a toddler built it. Have never had an update feels like I’m stuck in the 1950s with this app. Probably built by a lot of bad hombres.

attributes.title: HE ALMOST KILLED MY GRANDMA
attributes.review:
This creepy orange man literally startled my grandmother so much that she dropped her dentures in the toilet. There she was, minding her own business, scrolling before wiping, when BOOM, he came out the phone with his little hands and his shiny orange skin. Bewildered she flailed her arms up and he dentures went straight down into the poo toilet. I was minding my own business in my room, with my Barbie collection, when her life alert went off. 

Anywho. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! You will be cursed! It’s in the Bible!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: i downloaded this app bc i thought it would help make the sky turn purple today but it didn’t. instead the sky turned green. i am not happy. i should sue this app for false advertising but i won’t bc i’m a nice person unlike some people. for those looking to download this app i highly recommend that you don’t and instead go play animal crossing or look at shawn mendas nudes or commit arson. plz do anything but download this awful app.
